lines: Jill Brady is always untying your shoes and running away. Today she is wearing a skirt. She is bent over picking up a pile of books from the floor.
You think of two ways that you can get back at stupid Jill. You can:
#RUN BY AND LIFT HER SKIRT UP OVER HER HEAD
#RUN BY AND PUSH HER SO SHE FALLS
You take a big lead and start running toward her.
Just before you get her, she moves away and puts her foot out. She trips you and you go sliding down the school hall, landing at the feet of Mr. Quincy, the meanest teacher in school. Uh, oh...

You lift up her skirt and bring it over her head in one neat motion. SHE LOOKS LIKE SUCH A JERK! Your friends start teasing her; "Nice panties, Jill!" Revenge is sweet, but watch out. She just might have the last laugh by marrying you one day.

THAT WAS MEAN! You could have hurt her like that. Fortunately, you didn't. She only bothers you because she has a crush on you. I know that is not important to you now, but later when she turns into a beautiful young woman, you'll be
wishing that she would pay attention by removing more than your shoes.

You have much more important things on your mind, like how to get Mom to let you join football, how to sneak in to see "Friday the 13th Part 45," and why Mr. Johnson, the Biology teacher, is allowed to wear the same suit 10 days in
a row when you can't even wear a stupid pair of socks for two days.
